mapper.update: update help_topic set name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, help_category_id = #{help_category_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, example = #{example,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where help_topic_id = #{help_topic_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select help_topic_id, name, help_category_id, description, example, url from help_topic
